item.title: Shoe Lab
item.description:
About Us

Shoe Lab specializes in high-quality leather crafts and expert shoe repair services. With a commitment to craftsmanship and customer satisfaction, we breathe new life into your favorite footwear and offer bespoke leather goods tailored to your style.

Our Services

  • Leather Crafts: High-quality handcrafted leather goods and accessories
  • Shoe Repair: Expert repair and restoration of all types of footwear
  • Bespoke Leather Goods: Custom-made leather items tailored to your specifications

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Andy Samaroo
  • Phone: 782-5643
  • Email: andysamaroo09@gmail.com
